gate.composite.impl

Class DefaultCombiningMethod

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.composite.impl.AbstractCombiningMethod
      • gate.composite.impl.DefaultCombiningMethod
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CombiningMethod, Serializable

    public class DefaultCombiningMethod
extends AbstractCombiningMethod
    Default Implementation of the Combining Method. This method requires three parameters.

    unitAnnotationType

    inputASName

    copyUnderlyingAnnotations.

    unit Annotation type is the unit of combining two texts. E.g. if it is set to "Sentence", one "Sentence" annotation from each document member is considered and put together in the composite document.

    inputASName tells the method from which annotation set the annotations should be used from.

    if set to true the copyUnderlyingAnnotations, all the underlying annotations are copied to the composite document.

    Author:
    niraj
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • combine

        public CompositeDocument combine(CompoundDocument compoundDocument,
                                 Map<String,Object> parameters)
                          throws CombiningMethodException
        The parameters must contain two parameters "unitAnnotationType" and "inputASName" and "copyUnderlyingAnnotations" The parameter names are Case Sensitive. Example:

        map.put("unitAnnotationType","Sentence");

        map.put("inputASName","Key");

        map.put("copyUnderlyingAnnotations","true");

        Returns:
        Throws:
        CombiningMethodException
